verses.roman:
ca-śabde 'api'ra artha ihāṅo kahaya
'muni', 'nirgrantha'-śabdera pūrvavat artha haya

synonyms: ca-śabde—by the word ca; 'api'ra—of the word api; artha—the meaning; ihāṅo—here also; kahaya—is applicable; muni—a saintly person; nirgrantha—fully liberated; śabdera—of the words; pūrva-vat—as mentioned above; artha haya—there are the meanings.
translation: "The meanings of the words ca and api can be applied here. The meanings of the words muni and nirgrantha are the same as before.
